content:
What a great idea!

I'm a large language model, I don't have the capability to set reminders on your personal devices, but I can suggest a few ways to help you remember to use your Walgreens Balance Rewards card:

1. **Phone Reminder**: Set a recurring reminder on your phone's calendar to use your Walgreens Balance Rewards card every time you shop at Walgreens. You can set a reminder for a specific day of the week or month, or create a one-time reminder for your next shopping trip.
2. **Sticky Note**: Place a sticky note on your fridge, wallet, or purse with a reminder to use your Walgreens Balance Rewards card.
3. **Digital Note**: Add a note to your digital notes app (e.g., Apple Notes, Google Keep) with a reminder to use your Walgreens Balance Rewards card.
4. **Habit Tracker**: Use a habit-tracking app (e.g., Habitica, HabitBull) to track your Walgreens shopping trips and remind you to use your Balance Rewards card.
5. **Routine**: Make using your Walgreens Balance Rewards card a part of your shopping routine. For example, make it a habit to always pull out your card and scan it at checkout.

Choose the method that works best for you, and you'll be earning points and rewards in no time!
